name: DROP TABLE
shortDescription: Delete a table and all its data
description: Permanently delete an Elasticsearch index and all its documents. This operation cannot be undone.

clauses.name: IF EXISTS
clauses.description: Don't raise an error if the table doesn't exist

examples.title: Drop a table
examples.description: Delete a table (error if not exists)

examples.title: Drop if exists
examples.description: Safely drop a table that may not exist

notes: This operation is irreversible - all data will be lost
For partitioned tables, drops the index template and all partitions
